title: Ruslan Makhmutov
text:
Ruslan Khamitovich Makhmutov (; born 27 January 1991) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. He plays for <a href="FC%20Volga%20Ulyanovsk">FC Volga Ulyanovsk</a>.
Career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> in 2008 for <a href="FC%20Togliatti">FC Togliatti</a>.
Makhmutov made his debut for the main squad of <a href="FC%20Rubin%20Kazan">Rubin Kazan</a> on 13 July 2010 in the <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Volgar-Gazprom%20Astrakhan">FC Volgar-Gazprom Astrakhan</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Neftekhimik%20Nizhnekamsk">FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk</a> on 10 July 2012 in a game against <a href="FC%20Metallurg-Kuzbass%20Novokuznetsk">FC Metallurg-Kuzbass Novokuznetsk</a>.
